page.title: 20TALES OF GHOSTLY PHENOMENA
page.content: Among tales of supernatural happenings in the area is that of the Ranglang which roams the fields and spinney formerly the site of Hulcote Manor's gardens, which several people have reported seeing recently. A phantom man has been seen meandering between the lime trees near Hulcote Church. The Ford Lane Dog, a large black, eight legged beast with two heads roams Brittens Lane(formerly Ford Lane) late at night. Folk living on Broughton Lane tell of the mysterious Broughton calf which ambles the highway crying for its mother after dark. People walking past the trees in Wavendon Lodge garden have reported feeling a peculiar atmosphere and seeing strange things.
